Events that occurred on 5 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1925 - Voice actor Wolfe Morris is born.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 179c.
1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 227.
1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mme Ossendrijver.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Joy Hill.
1982 - Voice actor Hans Conried dies.
1989 - The Return of the Shadow is published in the US.
1996 - Actor Maxim Baldry is born.
1998 - Roverandom is published in the UK.
2004 - Graphic novel Heaven's War is published.
2008 - The Times ranks J.R.R. Tolkien the sixth-best post-war British writer.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels south along the Misty Mountains.
